message: I am looking for a lightweight SMS gateway for a local (isolated) prototype.  Any recommendation?
Why don't you try Tropo? its an open source api for creating sms, voice, xmpp, speech recognition / synthesis, etc etc... Its free, and obscenely easy to integrate
Tropo or Twilio for sure. Both have free sandboxes if you are prototyping.

You can use google voice to send/receive texts but it's an unofficial API, http://sphinxdoc.github.com/pygooglevoice/examples.html#send-sms-messages http://sphinxdoc.github.com/pygooglevoice/examples.html#parse-received-sms
Can't use public APIs, the prototype has to be isolated within a network.
